problem.markdown: >>What is the slope of the line shown in the graph above? (Answer in decimal form, rounded to the nearest hundredth)<< = .67 [explanation] Slope is change in Y over change in X or rise over run.
problem.p: What is the slope of the line shown in the graph above? (Answer in decimal form, rounded to the nearest hundredth)
